amendment.description: Amendment allows States to have 20 days to review and comment on an application for receipt of funds received under the bill with regard to the proposed use of such funds. The bill allowed 45 days for such review.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to allow the Chief Executive Officer of a state to have 20 days to review and comment on an application for receipt of funds received under the bill with regard to the proposed use of such funds. The bill allowed 45 days for such review.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
